defaults.subject: Modern Neo-Wa Portrait
defaults.description: Analyze the provided base photo, preserve the subject's exact identity, and refine complexion, makeup detailing, wardrobe textures, and studio lighting to craft a fresh, translucent, rosy modern Wa-inspired portrait.

style.aesthetic: High-end studio polish emphasizing translucent luminous skin

hair.style: Refined half-up bun with sleek trailing straight pieces and mirror-like shine
hair.accessory: Gold metallic hair ornament with sculpted white petals and pearls

clothing.top: Modern Wa-inspired kimono with luminous gold sheen and sculpted off-shoulder sleeves
clothing.material: High-fashion silk with fluid iridescent gold sheen
clothing.pattern: Vivid raised red and blue floral embroidery with classic Japanese motifs
clothing.details: Wide off-shoulder sleeves showcasing graceful neck and collarbones
clothing.obi: Deep navy structured obi belt with crisp woven texture
clothing.nails: Sheer pink jelly nails with a plump glossy finish

makeup.style: Sheer water-glow makeup that amplifies healthy color

details.eyebrows: Delicate curved brows with visible hair texture
details.eyeliner: Defined inner tightline with translucent wash
details.eyelashes: Individually separated natural lashes with gentle curl
details.blush: Soft peach or coral blush buffed broadly across the cheeks
details.lips: Juicy peach jelly lips with mirror-like shine
details.eye: Clear almond eyes with a subtle smile, translucent eyeshadow, and steady gaze
details.contour: Light sculpting to enhance natural facial structure

skin.tone: Fair, rosy, and luminous with healthy translucency
skin.texture: Fine, poreless, hydrated glass skin with resilience
skin.highlight: T-zone, cheekbones, and chin brushed with delicate highlights

pose.hands: Hands gracefully crossed at the waist, fingers long and relaxed
pose.shoulder: Open bare shoulders with pronounced collarbones and luminous skin
pose.expression: Warm, confident micro-smile gazing softly into the lens
pose.camera_angle: Eye-level studio angle focused on the subject's face

background.elements: Graceful cherry blossom branches with delicate petals
background.lighting: Layered soft studio lights with key, rim, and fill for luminous transparency

detail.quality: Ultra high-resolution capture revealing strands, pores, and silk textures
detail.render: Photorealistic rendering that emphasizes true material sheen
detail.skinTexture: Fine, poreless, hydrated glass skin with resilience
detail.skinTone: Fair rosy luminosity that looks healthy
detail.skinHighlight: Delicate highlights along the T-zone, cheekbones, and chin
detail.age: Maintains the subject's true age while enhancing healthy radiance

composition.frame: Half-length portrait with disciplined studio framing

descriptions.en: Analyze the provided base photo, preserve the subject's exact identity, and refine complexion, makeup detailing, wardrobe textures, and studio lighting to craft a fresh, translucent, rosy modern Wa-inspired portrait.
descriptions.zh: 基于原始图像，对人物气色、妆容细节、服饰质感及环境光影进行全方位优化，打造清新透亮、气色红润的现代和风影棚写真。

descriptionHint.zh: 内容会实时同步到 JSON description 字段。
descriptionHint.en: Text syncs to the JSON description field.

customOptionsPlaceholder.zh: 每行：柔和光线 | Soft lighting

customHint.zh: 每行使用“中文 | English”格式。

customDeleteConfirm.zh: 确定要删除这个自定义维度吗？

customErrorOptions.en: Please provide at least one option.

presetNoPresets.zh: 当前还没有保存的预设。

presetThumbnailDropHint.zh: 粘贴图片链接，或拖入图片自动生成 Data URL。
presetThumbnailDropHint.en: Paste an image URL or drop a file to auto-generate a data URL.

presetThumbnailDropSuccess.zh: 已载入图片并填充 Data URL。
presetThumbnailDropSuccess.en: Image loaded and data URL applied.

presetThumbnailDropError.en: Only image files can be dropped here.

hairStyle.en: Long dark brown hair, side part on the left, Korean-style loose curls at the ends, small front strands, hair blowing slightly across the face
hairStyle.zh: 深棕色长发，左侧偏分，韩系尾部自然大卷，碎发轻拂脸颊

hairStyle.en: Medium-length hair, soft waves, curtain bangs
hairStyle.zh: 中长发，柔和波浪卷，窗帘刘海

hairStyle.en: Straight long hair, center part, silky texture
hairStyle.zh: 直发长发，中分，顺滑质感

hairStyle.en: Short bob, subtle waves, side-swept bangs
hairStyle.zh: 短波波头，微卷，侧分刘海

hairStyle.en: Loose messy bun with face-framing tendrils
hairStyle.zh: 慵懒松散丸子头，碎发勾勒脸部

hairStyle.en: Low ribbon ponytail with gentle outward curls
hairStyle.zh: 低马尾配缎带，尾端柔和外卷

hairStyle.en: Shoulder-length blunt cut with airy micro bangs
Long braided pigtails with playful texture
Long sleek center-part hair with face-framing baby braids braided tight near the roots
hairStyle.zh: 中分长直发，脸颊两侧贴头皮细麻花小辫

hairStyle.en: Refined half-up bun with sleek trailing straight pieces and mirror-like shine
hairStyle.zh: 精致半高盘发，两侧垂顺直发，发丝光泽感强

hairAccessory.en: Gold metallic hair ornament with sculpted white petals and pearls
hairAccessory.zh: 金色金属发饰，点缀立体白色花瓣与珍珠

top.en: Oversized blue striped knit sweater with white stripes
top.zh: 宽松蓝白条纹针织毛衣

top.en: Cream knit cardigan with wooden buttons
Beige trench coat layered over a white tee
Oatmeal ribbed knit cardigan with large tortoise shell buttons layered over a white crewneck tee
top.zh: 燕麦色罗纹针织开衫配玳瑁大纽扣，内搭白色圆领 T 恤

top.en: Modern Wa-inspired kimono with luminous gold sheen and sculpted off-shoulder sleeves
top.zh: 改良和风和服，金色光泽，雕刻感露肩宽袖

garmentMaterial.en: High-fashion silk with fluid iridescent gold sheen
garmentMaterial.zh: 高定丝绸，流光溢彩的金色光泽

garmentPattern.en: Vivid raised red and blue floral embroidery with classic Japanese motifs
garmentPattern.zh: 鲜艳立体的红蓝花卉刺绣与传统日式纹样

garmentDetail.en: Wide off-shoulder sleeves showcasing graceful neck and collarbones
garmentDetail.zh: 宽大露肩袖口，凸显优雅肩颈

obi.en: Deep navy structured obi belt with crisp woven texture
obi.zh: 质感深蓝色宽腰封，织纹清晰

nails.en: Almond-shaped, blue with subtle sparkling crystals
nails.zh: 杏仁形，蓝色搭配细微晶钻闪光
杏仁形，海军蓝渐变带微光

nails.en: Glossy black almond nails with chrome tips
nails.zh: 亮黑杏仁甲配铬色指尖

nails.en: Sheer pink jelly nails with glitter flakes
nails.zh: 半透粉色果冻甲点缀细闪

nails.en: Almond-shaped, semi-transparent creamy pink with subtle pearlescent glow
nails.zh: 杏仁形，半透明奶油粉色带微珠光

earrings.zh: 高光泽度金色珍珠垂坠耳饰

rings.en: Stacked rose gold rings with tiny gems
rings.zh: 叠戴玫瑰金戒指镶小钻

makeupStyle.en: No-makeup Korean glass skin with innocent pure vibe
makeupStyle.zh: 清透伪素颜韩系水光肌，纯欲风
柔和自然的粉嫩光泽妆

makeupStyle.en: Sheer water-glow makeup that enhances natural rosy complexion
makeupStyle.zh: 清透水光妆，强调自然红润好气色

blush.en: Light nude on cheeks, soft red on nose
Soft pink across cheeks and nose
Sakura pink blush diffused broadly across center cheeks for youthful radiance
blush.zh: 樱花粉腮红大面积晕染面中，提升气色

blush.en: Natural peach or coral blush softly buffed across wide cheek area
blush.zh: 自然蜜桃或珊瑚腮红，大面积柔和晕染双颊

contour.zh: 若有似无的轻薄修容，保持柔和

contour.en: Light sculpting to enhance natural facial structure
contour.zh: 轻微自然的修容，强调面部立体轮廓

eyeliner.en: Invisible tightline with minimal eye makeup and no visible eyeshadow
eyeliner.zh: 极简眼妆，贴近内眼线，无明显眼影
细致柔化的韩系棕色眼线

eyeliner.en: Defined inner tightline with translucent wash for luminous eyes
eyeliner.zh: 内眼线清晰有神，搭配清透眼影

eyelashes.zh: 根部上提睫毛嫁接效果

eyelashes.en: Clean separated natural lashes with defined roots, zero clumps
eyelashes.zh: 根根分明的自然睫毛，根部清晰不结块

eyelashes.en: Root-separated natural lashes with gentle curl and extra brightness
eyelashes.zh: 根根分明的自然卷翘睫毛，增添神采

eyeDetail.en: Soft luminous gaze with subtle shimmer
eyeDetail.zh: 柔和发光的双眼，点缀轻微闪片

eyeDetail.en: Clear almond eyes with a gentle smile, translucent eyeshadow, and steady gaze
eyeDetail.zh: 清澈杏眼，含蓄微笑，清透眼影直视镜头

eyebrows.en: Delicate curved brows with visible hair texture
eyebrows.zh: 精致自然弯眉，毛流感清晰

lips.en: Nude with a hint of red
Peach jelly lips with mirror gloss, soft pink and plump
lips.zh: 蜜桃果冻镜面唇，嫩粉水嘟嘟

lips.en: Hydrated cherry stain with sheer gloss
lips.zh: 水润樱桃染唇，轻透光泽

lips.en: Water-rich jelly lips in juicy peach pink with mirror shine
lips.zh: 水润果冻唇，饱满蜜桃粉色，镜面光泽

hands.en: Hands gracefully crossed at the waist, fingers long and relaxed
hands.zh: 双手优雅交叠于腰前，手指修长

shoulderPose.zh: 肩颈微微倾斜，状态放松

shoulderPose.en: Open bare shoulders with pronounced collarbones and luminous skin
shoulderPose.zh: 舒展裸肩，锁骨分明且肌肤泛着光泽

expression.en: Warm confident micro-smile with soft gaze into the lens
expression.zh: 温柔自信的微笑，目光柔和直视镜头

cameraAngle.en: High-angle selfie, approx 30 degrees above the face
Close crop from chin to forehead
cameraAngle.zh: 从下巴到额头的近景裁切

cameraAngle.en: Eye-level studio angle focused on the subject's face
cameraAngle.zh: 平视机位，聚焦人物面部

frame.en: Half-length portrait with disciplined studio framing

bgColor.en: Dark wall with shallow depth, contrasting with flash lighting
bgColor.zh: 深色墙面浅景深，与闪光形成对比

bgColor.en: Plain dark background with subtle texture

bgColor.zh: 哑光木炭灰墙面，浅景深

bgColor.en: Soft beige wall with warm undertone

bgColor.zh: 干净无瑕的浅灰白渐变

backgroundElements.en: Graceful cherry blossom branches with delicate petals
backgroundElements.zh: 上方点缀形态优美、细节真实的樱花枝

bgEffect.en: Minimalist, modern, friendly, with slight reflective highlights
bgEffect.zh: 极简现代，友好氛围，略带反光高光
干净现代背景，微微光泽

bgEffect.en: Bokeh fairy lights behind the subject

bgEffect.zh: 柔和且具层次的渐变光影

lighting.en: Cool dim light with flash highlighting the face, hair, skin, and clothing texture
lighting.zh: 冷色微暗环境，闪光强调脸部、头发、肌肤与针织质感

lighting.en: Low ambient light with strong flash contrast
Split lighting with flash on one side
Warm desk lamp mixed with cool flash
Backlit hair light with fill flash
lighting.zh: 背光发光结合补光闪光

lighting.en: Diffused soft light with gentle haze glow effect
lighting.zh: 漫射柔光，伴随轻微 haze glow 效果

lighting.en: Layered soft studio lights with key, rim, and fill for luminous transparency
lighting.zh: 柔和多层的影棚布光，主光勾勒轮廓，辅光填补暗部

mood.en: Cozy innocent pure vibe with soft autumn casual energy
mood.zh: 舒适纯欲氛围，温暖秋冬感

mood.en: Soft, pink, subtly sweet soft-girl vibe
mood.zh: 柔软粉嫩、轻甜的 soft girl 气质

aesthetic.en: High-end studio polish emphasizing translucent luminous skin
aesthetic.zh: 高级影棚质感，强调通透光泽肌

quality.en: Ultra high-definition 4K clarity, crisp lens detail, zero noise
quality.zh: 超高清 4K 画质，镜头清晰无噪点

quality.en: 6K cinema-grade sharpness with immaculate texture rendering
quality.zh: 6K 电影级锐度，质感完美呈现
8K 超写实效果，焦点极致锐利

quality.en: High-resolution RAW-style capture, deep dynamic range
quality.zh: 高分辨率 RAW 风格捕捉，宽容度高

quality.en: High-resolution capture with gentle soft focus and luminous sheen
quality.zh: 高解析但带轻柔焦，呈现细腻光泽感

quality.en: Ultra high-resolution capture revealing strands, pores, and silk texture
quality.zh: 超高解析度呈现发丝、毛孔与丝缎纹理

skinTexture.en: Water-plump glass skin, poreless glow, silky sheen
skinTexture.zh: 水嫩玻璃肌，毛孔隐形，丝滑高光

skinTexture.en: Bouncy baby-skin texture with translucent dew
skinTexture.zh: 弹嫩婴儿肌质感，透亮水润

skinTexture.en: Airbrushed yet realistic complexion, blurred imperfections
skinTexture.zh: 真实又磨皮的底妆，瑕疵柔化

skinTexture.en: Hydrated, luminous skin with subtle reflections
skinTexture.zh: 高保湿亮泽肤感，带柔和反光

skinTexture.en: Silky smooth, translucent skin with natural soft glow
Fine, poreless, hydrated glass skin with resilience
skinTexture.zh: 细腻无瑕的水光肌，富有弹性与透明感

skinTone.en: Fair, rosy, and luminous with healthy translucency

skinHighlight.en: T-zone, cheekbones, and chin brushed with delicate highlights
skinHighlight.zh: T 区、颧骨与下巴布置细腻自然高光

renderStyle.en: Photorealistic rendering that emphasizes true material sheen
renderStyle.zh: 写实级渲染，强调材质真实光泽

ageShift.en: Appears about 5 years younger while matching the reference identity
ageShift.zh: 保持人物特征基础上，看起来年轻约 5 岁

ageShift.en: Appears 8 years younger with youthful vitality
ageShift.zh: 整体年轻约 8 岁，状态青春

ageShift.en: Appears 10 years younger but unmistakably the same person
ageShift.zh: 看起来年轻约 10 岁，但仍是同一人

ageShift.en: Subtle age rewind (3-5 years) keeping every defining trait
ageShift.zh: 轻度逆龄 3-5 岁，保留所有特征

ageShift.en: Maintains the subject's true age while enhancing healthy radiance
ageShift.zh: 维持真实年龄，仅放大全面健康红润感

presets.name: 官方示例 · 清透水光

state.hairStyle: Long sleek center-part hair with face-framing baby braids braided tight near the roots
state.top: Oatmeal ribbed knit cardigan with large tortoise shell buttons layered over a white crewneck tee
state.makeupStyle: No-makeup Korean glass skin with innocent pure vibe
state.blush: Sakura pink blush diffused broadly across center cheeks for youthful radiance
state.lips: Peach jelly lips with mirror gloss, soft pink and plump
state.mood: Cozy innocent pure vibe with soft autumn casual energy
state.quality: Ultra high-definition 4K clarity, crisp lens detail, zero noise
state.skinTexture: Water-plump glass skin, poreless glow, silky sheen
state.ageShift: Appears about 5 years younger while matching the reference identity

description.zh: 请仔细分析我提供的照片，完整保留人物的面部特征与五官，确保看起来是同一个人，再打造清透伪素颜的水光自拍，突出居家温柔氛围与 4K 级画质。
description.en: Carefully analyze the reference photo and keep the exact facial features so she remains the same person, then craft a glass-skin selfie with innocent vibes and ultra-clean 4K softness.

presets.name: 官方示例 · 夜幕闪光

state.hairStyle: Loose messy bun with face-framing tendrils
state.bgColor: Dark wall with shallow depth, contrasting with flash lighting
state.lighting: Split lighting with flash on one side
state.quality: 6K cinema-grade sharpness with immaculate texture rendering
state.skinTexture: Airbrushed yet realistic complexion, blurred imperfections
state.ageShift: Appears 8 years younger with youthful vitality

description.zh: 请仔细分析我提供的照片，完整保留人物面部结构与五官，随后在夜幕室内用强对比闪光营造高级杂志感，同时呈现更年轻的肌肤状态。
description.en: Carefully analyze the provided face, keep every defining feature, and then shoot a fashion night-flash portrait that subtly rejuvenates the skin while preserving identity.

presets.name: 官方示例 · 软萌纯欲

state.hairStyle: Shoulder-length blunt cut with airy micro bangs
state.rings: Stacked rose gold rings with tiny gems
state.blush: Soft pink across cheeks and nose
state.quality: 6K cinema-grade sharpness with immaculate texture rendering
state.skinTexture: Bouncy baby-skin texture with translucent dew
state.ageShift: Subtle age rewind (3-5 years) keeping every defining trait

description.zh: 请仔细分析我提供的照片，完整保留人物面貌与五官，再以空气刘海与粉彩毛衣营造软萌纯欲感，搭配柔光与渐层背景凸显幼态肤质。
description.en: Carefully analyze the source portrait and keep the same facial identity, then style airy bangs + pastel knit for soft coquette vibes with dewy youthful skin.

presets.name: 官方示例 · 柔粉软萌

state.hairStyle: Shoulder-length blunt cut with airy micro bangs
state.rings: Stacked rose gold rings with tiny gems
state.nails: Almond-shaped, semi-transparent creamy pink with subtle pearlescent glow
state.blush: Soft pink across cheeks and nose
state.lips: Hydrated cherry stain with sheer gloss
state.cameraAngle: High-angle selfie, approx 30 degrees above the face
state.lighting: Diffused soft light with gentle haze glow effect
state.mood: Soft, pink, subtly sweet soft-girl vibe
state.quality: High-resolution capture with gentle soft focus and luminous sheen
state.skinTexture: Silky smooth, translucent skin with natural soft glow
state.ageShift: Subtle age rewind (3-5 years) keeping every defining trait

description.zh: 请仔细分析我提供的照片，完整保留人物面貌与五官，以空气刘海与粉彩毛衣呈现柔和粉调的软萌纯欲气质，搭配柔光与轻雾化背景强化肌肤的细腻光泽感。
description.en: Carefully analyze the provided portrait, keep the exact facial identity, then pair airy bangs and a pastel mohair sweater for a soft pink soft-girl vibe, using diffused glow + gentle haze to highlight luminous skin.

presets.name: 官方示例 · 都市极简

state.hairStyle: Straight long hair, center part, silky texture
state.top: Beige trench coat layered over a white tee
state.lighting: Warm desk lamp mixed with cool flash
state.quality: High-resolution RAW-style capture, deep dynamic range
state.skinTexture: Hydrated, luminous skin with subtle reflections
state.ageShift: Appears about 5 years younger while matching the reference identity

description.zh: 请仔细分析我提供的照片，完整保留人物的面部特征，配合米色风衣与自然光打造都市极简自拍，在保留原脸的同时呈现更清透年轻的状态。
description.en: Carefully study the reference face, keep it identical, and pair a beige trench with natural light for a minimal city portrait that feels fresher and younger.

presets.name: 官方示例 · 复古影像

state.hairStyle: Loose messy bun with face-framing tendrils
state.top: Cream knit cardigan with wooden buttons
state.bgColor: Soft beige wall with warm undertone
state.lighting: Backlit hair light with fill flash
state.skinTexture: Airbrushed yet realistic complexion, blurred imperfections
state.ageShift: Appears 8 years younger with youthful vitality

description.zh: 请仔细分析我提供的照片，完整保留人物面孔，再用复古妆容与暖色背景打造怀旧胶片氛围，在高精度画质中呈现更年轻但仍是同一人的效果。
description.en: Carefully analyze the reference and keep every facial trait, then apply retro makeup + warm backdrop for a vintage film vibe that stays unmistakably the same person.

description.zh: 基于原始图像，对人物气色、妆容细节、服饰质感及环境光影进行全方位优化，打造清新透亮、气色红润的现代和风影棚写真。
description.en: Analyze the provided base photo, preserve the subject's exact identity, and refine complexion, makeup detailing, wardrobe textures, and studio lighting to craft a fresh, translucent, rosy modern Wa-inspired portrait.
